name: Scott William
description:
Am simple man who love and care alot and i have been single for a very long time now and am tired of sleep and wake alone and now i need a woman who will be the best for me in life who will love and care about me aswell, i will like my woman to have God fearing and open minded with me and share the equal love to have everlasting relationship for life.
looking nice and open minded woman that really serious and who know what is good for her and ready to build a wall of love in her heath…… the woman who can turn my happiness back alive and make me happy always.
